name: Help! Ghosts! Party!
description:
This game was done for NaNoRenO 2022!

Your dream mansion party is at risk. Ghosts and fairies dwell everywhere. They can help you, or doom you. It's up to you.

This game must be played in fullscreen, or characters and decisions bug out — we discovered this late and couldn't correct it in time to upload. RMB or mouse scroll up to progress in the dialogues.

Extra music pieces: Grand Dark Waltz Trio Allegro, The Builder, Pamgaea, Itty Bitty 8 Bit, and Super Friendly by Kevin MacLeod (Filmmusic.io Standard License).
